Professional Experience
▼

Pearson North America
Data Scientist - NLP and Machine Learning | October 2019 - January 2021
  • Defined, developed models for, and evaluated an NLP task to make progress towards providing feedback to college-level essays.
  • Research and development of NLP models for English assessment geared towards educational applications
  • Development of assessment techniques for an ELL learning application.
United States Army Research Laboratory
Senior Computational Linguist (contractor) | November 2018 - Septemeber 2019
  • Research and development of models and application for ASR and Machine Translation of low-resource languages into English.
  • Writing a C++ wrapper for Kaldi to integrate custom ASR models with in-house research application
  • Research and development of a neural morphological analyzer, for a morphologically rich language that plugs into a larger NLP pipeline.
Avhana Health
Senior Engineer | September 2018 - November 2019
  • Back-end development in Ruby on Rails and Java.
  • Some front end development in ReactJS
  • Development of several asynchronous web features and workflows for managing healthcare guidelines, and integrating them with Electronic Medical Records
  • Implementing the logic for medical guidelines, and integrating with multiple applications.

Software Engineer | June 2015 - January 2017
